actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide a temporary suspension of the duty on certain freight car parts.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend the customs duty on side frames and truck bolsters for railroad freight cars until May 1, 1980.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide a temporary suspension of the duty on certain freight car parts.
